page.title: 06Industry in Northill
page.content: {Agriculture}is the only{productive {industry}in the area. This may be due to local opposition encouraged by the planning authorities. There are{a few {small businesses}mostly to meet local needs. Several builders with their allied craftsmen operate from the village. They have developed special skills in the restoration & extension of graded and other dwellings. Other businesses comprise an old established signwriting firm, motor body repairers & a firm offering accounting services, &, via an agency, the usual facilities of a Building Society. There is also a partnership of property consultants and publishers. The number of people employed by these concerns is minimal and not many are recruited from the local population. The majority commute either to nearby towns or London which offer a broad spectrum of{employment.
